remarks: Any function on the reals is either increasing, decreasing, or has a triple of points in a vee formation.  (This theorem was created on demand by Mario Carneiro for the 6PCM conference in Bialystok, 1-Jul-2014.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jul-2014.)
statement:
pmltpc $p |- ( ( F e. ( RR ^pm RR ) /\ A C_ dom F ) -> ( A. x e. A A. y e. A ( x <_ y -> ( F ` x ) <_ ( F ` y ) ) \/ A. x e. A A. y e. A ( x <_ y -> ( F ` y ) <_ ( F ` x ) ) \/ E. a e. A E. b e. A E. c e. A ( a < b /\ b < c /\ ( ( ( F ` a ) < ( F ` b ) /\ ( F ` c ) < ( F ` b ) ) \/ ( ( F ` b ) < ( F ` a ) /\ ( F ` b ) < ( F ` c ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A a b c x y $.
$d F a b c x y $.
